article_title: Stenehjem to Pitch Why He Deserves Your Vote for ND Governor
article_text:
Wayne Stenehjem has spent several decades in Bismarck as a lawmaker and attorney general.

Now, he wants to lead North Dakota as its governor, but Stenehjem is locked in a fierce primary battle.

He's clashed with his opponents Doug Burgum and Paul Sorum on Obamacare, guns and abortion.

Last week, we brought you Burgum and Sorum's viewpoints.

Tonight, Stenehjem will be speaking with political reporter Max Grossfeld on why he deserves your vote.
